entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:36 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.2°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:15 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
